synthesis_conditions.method: Slow diffusion of a methanol solution of H2aip into a methanol solution of Cu(NO3)2·3H2O and pyridine
synthesis_conditions.drying_method: vacuum for 2 h at room temperature

synthesis_conditions.method: Heating the crystalline powder of PCP 1 in a silica glass capillary at 353 K in vacuum for 1 h to remove the guest molecules
synthesis_conditions.equipment: silica glass capillary (0.4 mm inside diameter)

synthesis_conditions.method: Filling the sample for structural analysis of the dried structure (PCP 2) with CO (50 kPa) at 77 K and sealed
